content: rachel scarf materials abbreviations - crochet hook 5 mm chain chain - hobbii fluffy day xl 80g single_crochet single_crochet - tapestry needle single_crochet blo single_crochet back loop only - scissors slip_stitch slip_stitch st stitch difficulty beginner i hope you will enjoy crocheting this project the rachel scarf is a beautiful accessory perfect for both beginners and experienced crocheters its classic look is created using row worked in the back loop only giving the scarf a clean and textured ribbed effect the finished scarf measures approximately 125 cm in length and 8 5 cm in width the pattern is straightforward relaxing to make and ideal as a gift or a cozy project for yourself rachel scarf start chain 165 + 1 extra chain to turn your work 166 chains total row 1 single_crochet in each stitch across chain 1 to turn 165 stitches row 2 14 single_crochet in the back loop only blo in each stitch across chain 1 to turn at the end of each row 165 stitches per row finishing fasten_off and weave in the ends
